snippet.title: School of Dragons Official Trailer
snippet.description: Register for the School of Dragons Beta for a chance to preview this new online virtual world game based on DreamWorks Animation's hit film, How to Train Your Dragon! Visit us at http://www.schoolofdragons.com/ to learn more.
